title: 226 31 "The Guy Who’s the Closest to Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!"Transliteration: "Mottomo Muteki ni Chikai Yatsu? To Mottomo Kiken na Otoko!" (Japanese:最も無敵に近い奴?と最も危険な男!) Directed by: Katsumi TokoroStoryboarded by: Eisaku Inoue Yoshiyuki Suga March 20, 2005(2005-03-20)[20] October 6, 2013
transformers_text: 226 31 The Guy Who s the Closest to Invincible And the Most Dangerous Man Transliteration Motto mo Mute ki ni Chi kai Ya tsu To Motto mo Ki ken na O toko Japanese Directed by Katsumi To koro Story boarded by E is aku Inoue Yoshiyuki Suga March 20 2005 2005 03 20 20 October 6 2013 Once Foxy wins back his crew he captures the Straw Hats Nami and Luffy fight Foxy and although he's defeated his crew accepts him back Later they sail to an island where they meet someone Robin knows a Marine named Aoki ji
